name: Forecasting Demand - Business User App
description: Forecasting Demand at Product Level using time series trained models

appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{ "components": [ { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Forecasting Demand at Product Level

Overview

Our Demand Forecasting Analytics App is designed for business users to accurately predict future product demand using optimized models. It empowers you to make informed decisions and optimize operations, ensuring efficient resource allocation and enhanced customer satisfaction.

Input

  • + User-friendly interface enables easy navigation through model selection.
  • + Access to advanced forecasting models like Prophet and SARIMAX for high accuracy.
  • + Quickly choose the best-fit model for specific forecasting requirements.

Output

  • + Clear performance insights for easy model comparison.
  • + Visuals help identify the most suitable model for forecasting needs.

Benefits

  • + Boosted Efficiency: Streamline operations by predicting demand and minimizing waste.
  • + Heightened Customer Satisfaction: Meet customer needs effectively by reducing stockouts and ensuring product availability.
  • + Strategic Growth: Use future demand trends to plan investments in capacity, markets, and products.
  • + Pinpoint Accuracy: Leverage advanced forecasting models for highly precise predictions.

Data Description

Field Name Description
Store The identifier or name of the store where the item was sold.
Item The identifier or name of the item sold.
Total_Quantity_Sold The total quantity of the item sold in the sales transaction.
